bibliographic-data.invention-title: Mechanisms for Executing a Process in a Cloud Computing Environment

nplcit.text: Simon, R.; Jukic, B.; Woan Sun Chang, "Optimal resource allocation for multi-service networks," Simulation Symposium, 2000. (SS 2000) Proceedings. 33rd Annual , vol., no., pp.33,41, 2000 doi: 10.1109/SIMSYM.2000.844898

abstract.p: Deterioration of service quality due to shortage of resources and/or increased cost of support due to excessive resources is minimized in the case where the amount of requested services may change in cloud computing. Provided are mechanisms for executing a process specified by a user in a cloud computing environment and charging the user for the process. The mechanisms include a receiving part for receiving an instruction to execute the specified process and a determining part for determining an external resource to provision from a first other computer system for a charge. The mechanisms further comprise an external resource securing part for securing the external resource on the first other computer system and an executing part for causing the external resource to execute at least a part of the specified process.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Computer system, method and program product

abstract.p: Deterioration of the service quality due to shortage of resources and/or waste of the cost of support due to excessive resources is suppressed in the case where the amount of requested services may change in cloud computing. Provided is a computer system for executing a process specified by a user and charging the user for the process, including: a receiving part for receiving an instruction to execute the specified process
a determining part for determining an external resource to provision from a first other computer system for a charge
an external resource securing part for securing the external resource on the first other computer system
and an executing part for causing the external resource to execute at least a part of the specified process.

When variations occur in the amount of service required by cloud computing, a reduction in the quality of the service due to the lack of a resource and/or a waste of management cost due to a surplus of the resource is suppressed. Disclosed is a computer system for executing the specification processing specified by a user and charging the user, which is provided with a reception unit for receiving an instruction to execute the specification processing, a determination unit for determining an external resource to be procured after receiving the charging from other first computer system, an external resource reservation unit for reserving the external resource on the other first computer system, and an execution unit for making the external resource execute at least part of the specification processing.

Lorsque des variations interviennent dans le volume de service requis par l'informatique en nuage, une diminution de la qualité de service due au manque de ressources et/ou un gaspillage des dépenses de gestion du à un surplus de ressource sont supprimés. Cette invention concerne un système informatique permettant de mettre en oeuvre un traitement spécifié par un utilisateur et de facturer ce traitement à cet utilisateur.
Ce système informatique comprend : une unité de réception d'une instruction d'exécution du traitement spécifié
une unité de détermination d'une ressource extérieure à fournir après réception de la facturation émanant d'un premier système informatique
unité de réservation extérieure pour la réservation de la ressource extérieure sur l'autre premier système informatique
et unité d'exécution garantissant que que la ressource extérieure exécute au moins une partie du traitement spécifié.
